docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. 如何部署博客到Github Pages 注册空仓库， 进入写文档的页面 mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: 首页

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: 注册空仓库， 进入写文档的页面 mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: 如何部署博客到Github Pages

docs.text: 如何部署博客到Github Pages 注册空仓库，例如： https://github.com/yumoz/blogs 克隆到本地，下载mkdocs工具； # 下载mkdocs工具 pip install mkdocs # 下载完成查看版本 CMD中输入命令：mkdocs --version mkdocs, version 1.6.0 from C:\Users\***** 进入写文档的页面 mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: 如何部署博客到Github Pages

docs.text: 注册空仓库，例如： https://github.com/yumoz/blogs 克隆到本地，下载mkdocs工具； # 下载mkdocs工具 pip install mkdocs # 下载完成查看版本 CMD中输入命令：mkdocs --version mkdocs, version 1.6.0 from C:\Users\***** 进入写文档的页面 mkdocs gh-deploy
